card.name: Aftershock
card.text: Eminence — At the beginning of each end step, if a Tank you control was dealt 3 or more damage this turn, it deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

card.name: Arcane Comet
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Mage you control attacks, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Baron Nashor
card.text: (This can be attacked.) Shroud +1: You can attack Baron Nashor. When Baron Nashor dies, each player who controls a creature that dealt combat damage to it this turn draws 4 cards and gains an emblem with “Creatures you control get +3/+3.”

card.name: Conquerer
card.text: Eminence — If a Marksman you control would deal damage, it deals true damage instead.

card.name: Dark Harvest
card.text: Eminence — Fighters and Assassins you control have “Consume: Put a +1/+1 counter on this champion.”

card.name: Electrocution
card.text: Eminence — If a Fighter or Assassin you control would deal 3 or more combat damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

card.name: Fleet Footwork
card.text: Eminence — Marksmen you control have haste.

card.name: Glacial Augment
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Support you control deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Grasping Undying
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Tank you control deals combat damage you gain 1 life.

card.name: Guardian
card.text: Eminence — Tanks you control can block an additional creature.

card.name: Hailing Blades
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Fighter or Assassin you control attacks, you may have it get -X/-0 and gain double strike until end of turn, where X is half its power, rounded down.

card.name: Inhibitor
card.text: (This can be attacked.) Each creature your opponents control enters the battlefield tapped and with an additional -1/-1 counter. When Inhibitor leaves the battlefield, each opponent spawns a colorless 5/5 Monster.

card.name: Kleptomancy
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Support you control deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.

card.name: Large Krug
card.text: When Large Krug dies, spawn two colorless 1/2 Golem Monsters.

card.name: Lethal Tempo
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Marksman you control becomes blocked it gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: The Nexus
card.text: (This can be attacked.) At the beginning of your upkeep, spawn three 1/2 Minions, three 2/1 Minions, and one 3/3 Minion. When The Nexus leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

card.name: Phase Rush
card.text: Eminence — At the beginning of your end step, untap all Mages you control.

card.name: Predator
card.text: Eminence — Fighters and Assassins you control have engage and haste.

card.name: Pressed Attack
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Marksmen you control attacks, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Rift Herald
card.text: Menace At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may destroy target Turret an opponent controls.

card.name: Rift Scuttler
card.text: T, Sacrifice Rift Scuttler: Until end of turn, Monster spells you cast cost one mana of any color less to cast.

card.name: Smite
card.text: Smite deals 4 true damage to target non-champion creature. If that creature is a Monster, exile it.

card.name: Summon Aery
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Mage you control attacks or activates an ability for the first time each turn, you may create a 1/1 Sprite with flying and haste. Sacrifice it at end of turn.

card.name: The Unsealed Spellbook
card.text: Eminence — Whenever you cast a Support spell, you may choose an summoner card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your command zone.

card.name: Accompanied Knight
card.text: When Accompanied Knight enters the battlefield, spawn a 1/1 white Squire. Knights you control have first strike as long as you control a Squire.

card.name: Bonded Roc
card.text: Flying Whenever Bonded Roc or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Chroma Dancer
card.text: Flash When Chroma Dancer enters the battlefield choose a color. Target creature you control gains protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Cloud Dragon
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Cloud Dragon enters the battlefield or attacks, you may blink another target creature you control. If you do, that creature returns tapped and attacking.

card.name: Demacian Recruit
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Demacian Recruit gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: The Great Master Kusho
card.text: First strike, vigilance At the beginning of your end step, if The Great Master Kusho did not attack or block this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it. At the beginning of each upkeep, The Great Master Kusho gets shield X until end of turn, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Ionian Mystic
card.text: T: Target creature or player gets shield 1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kinkou Balance Keeper
card.text: Whenever a creature you control blocks alone, it gets shield 2 until end of turn.

card.name: Lhotlan Battle-Dancer
card.text: Whenever Lhotlan Battle-Dancer or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, Vastaya creatures you control get shield 1 until end of turn.

card.name: Razorbeak
card.text: Flying Other Birds you control get +1/+0 and have flying. At the beginning of your upkeep, spawn a 0/1 white Bird.

card.name: Rune-Binder
card.text: When Rune-Binder enters the battlefield, exile target creature until Rune-Binder leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Blue Sentinel
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost U less to cast. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery, you may draw a card. If you don’t, scry 2.

card.name: Citadel Professor
card.text: When Citadel Professor enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

card.name: Fortune Finder
card.text: Whenever Fortune Finder deals combat damage to a player, you may scry 2.

card.name: Frost Knight
card.text: When Frost Knight enters the battlefield, stun target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Frostbite
card.text: Stun target creature an opponent controls. If B was spent to cast this spell, destroy target stunned creature.

card.name: Frozen in Thought
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, return it to it’s owners hand. That player can’t cast spells with the same name as that spell this turn.

card.name: Glacial Insight
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry X, where X is the number of basic Island you control.

card.name: Hawkshot Archer
card.text: Reach Whenever Hawkshot Archer attacks, scry 1.

card.name: Ice-Tooth Pirhannas
card.text: Defender Whenever Ice-Tooth Pirhanna’s deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Ocean Dragon
card.text: Flying, hexproof Creatures blocking or blocked by Ocean Dragon lose first strike and double strike.

card.name: Serpant of the Scrolls
card.text: When Serpant of the Scrolls or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Silverwing Duster
card.text: Creatures you control with flying have hexproof.

card.name: Student of the Lightbringers
card.text: When Student of the Lightbringers enters the battlefield, silence target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Ancient Dragon
card.text: Flying, menace Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional B.

card.name: Dire Wildclaw
card.text: Dire Wildclaw gets +1/+1 for each other Wolf you control.

card.name: Encase in True Ice
card.text: When Encase in True Ice enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Encase in True Ice leaves the battlefield. That creature enters the battlefield with an additional -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Frostbite Abyssal
card.text: You may cast Frostbite Abyssal from your graveyard if you sacrifice a Squire in addition to its other costs.

card.name: Murk Wolves
card.text: Menace, grievous wounds

card.name: Putrid Giant
card.text: Menace, Trample At the beginning of your end step, discard a card. When Putrid Giant deals combat damage to an opponent, that player discards a card.

card.name: Stolen Insight
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card, then draws a card. Scry 2.

card.name: Vilemaw
card.text: Reach, menace, deathtouch, shroud Vilemaw can block an additional creature each combat. Creatures fighting, blocking, or being blocked by Vilemaw lose first strike and double strike. 4BBBB, T: Each creature your opponents control fights Vilemaw.

card.name: Brambleback
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, target creature you control gains grievous wounds and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Infernal Dragon
card.text: Flying, haste As long as Infernal Dragon is attacking, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Gromp
card.text: Reach As long as Gromp hasn’t been dealt damage it has double strike.

card.name: Land Fisher
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Land Fisher.

card.name: Mountain Dragon
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever Mountain Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Ottrani Charger
card.text: Whenever Ottrani Charger or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Strig Scout
card.text: Whenever Strig Scout or another Vastaya creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Barrier
card.text: Target creature or player gets Shield 5 until end of turn.

card.name: Cleanse
card.text: Cleanse target creature.

card.name: Elder Dragon
card.text: Flying, double strike This spell cost 2 less to cast for each Dragon card in your graveyard. Other Dragons you control get +1/+1 and have double strike.

card.name: Executioner Troll
card.text: Whenever Executioner Troll deals combat damage to a tapped creature, destroy that creature.

card.name: Exhaust
card.text: Target attacking or blocking creature gets -3/-3 and loses first strike and double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Flash
card.text: Choose one — • Blink target creature you control. • Until the end of turn, the next spell you cast can be cast as if it had flash.

card.name: Ghost
card.text: Until end of turn target creature gets haste, first strike, and unblockable.

card.name: Iceborn Knight
card.text: Whenever Iceborn Knight deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Ignite
card.text: Grievous Wounds Deal 3 true damage to any target.

card.name: Lissandras Story Hunters
card.text: UB, T: Each opponent mills 2. Then exile target card from an opponents graveyard.

card.name: Marai Healer
card.text: Whenever Marai Healer or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life for each Vastaya you control.

card.name: Promote
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. That creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Rampaging Thunderhorn
card.text: When Rampaging Thunderhorn attacks, stun it and up to one target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Put target creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Shimon Ambush Leader
card.text: Engage Whenever Shimon Ambush Leader or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature an opponent controls. Other Vastaya creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Silverwing Rider
card.text: Flying, vigilance Spells your opponents control that target Silverwing Rider cost 2 more to cast.

card.name: Surge
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains engage and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Teleport
card.text: Search your hand and/or library for a champion card and exile it. Put three time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn’t have suspend, it gains suspend. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Tithe Collector
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter that spell unless they pay 1 for each spell they have cast this turn.

card.name: Ice-Stone Squire
card.text: Whenever a Knight you control deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Monk of Hirana
card.text: T: Add C. When Monk of Hirana dies, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Fountain Obelisk
card.text: Defender, indestructible, hexproof Fountain Obelisk gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Fountain Obelisk is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1. T: Deal 5 true damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Inhibitor Turret
card.text: Defender Inhibitor Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Inhibitor Turret is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Inner Turret
card.text: Defender Inner Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature.

card.name: Nexus Turret
card.text: Defender Nexus Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Nexus Turret is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1. When Nexus Turret enters the battlefield, create a copy of it.

card.name: Outer Turret
card.text: Defender

card.name: Cloud Field
card.text: (T: Add W or U.) Cloud Field enters the battlefield tapped. W/UW/U, T: Scry X, where X is the number of creatures that entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

card.name: Concealing Canopy
card.text: (T: Add R or G.) Concealing Canopy enters the battlefield tapped. R/GR/G, T: Creature you control have haste until end of turn.

card.name: Conquered Terrain
card.text: (T: Add B or R.) Conquered Terrain enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Plains, Island, or Forest.

card.name: First Lands
card.text: (T: Add W or G.) First Lands enters the battlefield tapped if you control an Island, Swamp, or Mountain.

card.name: Frost Barrens
card.text: (T: Add U or B.) Frost Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. U/BU/B, T: Stun target creature that dealt combat damage to you this turn.

card.name: The Great Barrier
card.text: T: Add RR, GG, or RG. Activate this ability only if you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.name: Howling Abyss
card.text: (T: Add U or B.) Howling Abyss enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Plains, Mountain, or Forest.

card.name: The Immortal Bastion
card.text: T, Sacrifice a creature: Add BB, RR, or BR. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste.

card.name: Palace Gardens
card.text: (T: Add W or U.) Palace Gardens enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Swamp, Mountain, or Forest.

card.name: Pit Mine
card.text: (T: Add B or R.) Pit Mine enters the battlefield tapped. B/RB/R, T: Target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it can’t block this turn.

card.name: The Placidium of Navori
card.text: T: Add WW, GG, or GW. Activate this ability only if you control 5 or more creatures and/or lands.

card.name: Rivers of Grass
card.text: (T: Add W or G.) Rivers of Grass enters the battlefield tapped. G/WG/W, T: Untap target creature you control.

card.name: Runeterra Wilds
card.text: (T: Add R or G.) Runeterra Wilds enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Plains, Island, or Swamp

card.name: The Temple of the Light Bringers
card.text: T, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Add WW, UU, or WU.

card.name: Unknown Territory
card.text: T, Exile Unknown Territory: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, or Forest and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
